definition: domestic and international/at home and abroad
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Friends worldwide are welcome to know more Tiens and experience Tiens products.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎更多海内外朋友了解和感受天狮产品。

sentences.english: With exquisite workmanship, PE celebrated, unique flavor from home or abroad.
sentences.chinese: 益以工艺精湛，风味独特著称，饮誉海内外。

sentences.english: The main form of disseminating"Lang Jun"in Nan Yin at home and abroad;
sentences.chinese: 南音“郎君”在海内外传播的主要方式。

sentences.english: Thank you for your Building Decoration Engineering Co. , Ltd. home and abroad, the support and love.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您对海内外建筑装饰工程有限公司的支持和厚爱。

sentences.english: In the last several years, we won the customer's trust and support.
sentences.chinese: 几年来赢得了海内外客户的信任和支持。

sentences.english: We sincerely welcome friends from various circles at home and abroad visit the guide and experiment.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎海内外各界朋友亲临指导与实验。

sentences.english: Welcome to contact us by calling or letter.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎海内外客商来电来函洽谈业务联系。

sentences.english: Welcome wholeheartedly domestic and foreign friends to develop long-run cooperation with us.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎海内外朋友与此同我们发展长远经贸合作。

sentences.english: The Bashu United League is an organization of people from Sichuan Province in China and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀同盟会是由海内外四川人组成的组织。

sentences.english: Social network for connecting Africans and Caribbeans at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 社会网络连接了海内外的非洲人和加勒比海人。

sentences.english: Sincerely welcome all to visit our company and do business with us.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚欢迎海内外客商莅临参观指导及洽谈业务。

sentences.english: Weclome customers to discuss the cooperation with us.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎海内外客人来我公司洽谈合作。

sentences.english: We warmly welcome the friends of various circles, both at home and abroad, to invest in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我们竭诚欢迎海内外各界朋友来上海投资。

sentences.english: Our company is directly related to domestic and overseas dealers rationing.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是直接与海内外经销商配货。

sentences.english: Zealously welcome everywhere merchants letter calls advisory, create beautiful tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 热忱欢迎海内外客商来电来函咨询，共创美好明天。

sentences.english: Sincerely welcome domestic and foreign trade sector companies to come to business negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 热诚欢迎海内外贸易界人士前来公司洽谈业务。

definition: to make a name/to become famous
domestic and international/at home and abroad
China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (media term used esp. since 1997)
all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
all walks of life/all social circles
to become known far and wide (idiom)/famous
